item.title: Changing XP Given
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

It will do 30 x playerlevel.

30 TIMES PLAYER LEVEL

If I have 20 range, when I next click it… it will give me 20 x 30xp. Which is 600xp.

item.title: Changing XP Given
item.dc:creator: @Random666 Random666
item.description:
@Random666 wrote:

How do I change the XP given for combat skills??
Its easy with the non-combat skills
But with Combat skills it doesnt work; e.g

case 2513:
case 2514:
if(actionTimer ==30) {
sendMessage(“You shoot at the target.”);
actionName = “range1”;
actionTimer = 30;
setAnimation(426);
addSkillXP((30playerLevel[4]), 4);
addSkillXP((10playerLevel[3]), 3);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

Instead of getting 30xp from shooting a target u get like 500

So how do i change XP given for combat skills??

Read full topic
